title: How to Make Strawberry Colada Punch

steps.headline: Add light coconut milk to blender.
Blend until smooth.
steps.description: Use a spatula to help with the blending process, if needed.

steps.headline: Pour blended strawberry mixture into a punch bowl.
Shake the can of pineapple juice and then measure out 3 cups juice.
steps.description: Pour the pineapple juice into the punch bowl.

steps.headline: Add the 3 cups club soda to the punch bowl.
Gently stir punch with punch ladle.
Ladle punch into punch glasses and serve.

text: Cut frozen strawberries into chunks.  Add frozen strawberries to blender.  Add light coconut milk to blender.  Blend until smooth. Use a spatula to help with the blending process, if needed. Pour blended strawberry mixture into a punch bowl.  Shake the can of pineapple juice and then measure out 3 cups juice. Pour the pineapple juice into the punch bowl. Add the 3 cups club soda to the punch bowl.  Add the light rum.  Add 1 cup of Club Soda.  Gently stir punch with punch ladle.  Ladle punch into punch glasses and serve.
